### Sampled Parameters 
Histograms of `r nsim` simulations of size of area 1 (`Size_area_1`), fraction of unfished biomass in area 1 (`Frac_area_1`), and the probability of staying in area 1 in a year (`Frac_area_1`), with vertical colored lines indicating `r nsamp` randomly drawn values used in other plots:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
par(mfrow=c(2,3))
hist2(Pars$Size_area_1, col=plotPars$col, axes=plotPars$axes, main="Size_area_1", breaks=plotPars$breaks)
abline(v=Pars$Size_area_1[its], col=1:nsamp, lwd=plotPars$lwd)
axis(side=1)  

hist2(Pars$Frac_area_1, col=plotPars$col, axes=plotPars$axes, main="Frac_area_1", breaks=plotPars$breaks)
abline(v=Pars$Frac_area_1[its], col=1:nsamp, lwd=plotPars$lwd)
axis(side=1) 

hist2(Pars$Prob_staying, col=plotPars$col, axes=plotPars$axes, main="Prob_staying", breaks=plotPars$breaks)
abline(v=Pars$Prob_staying[its], col=1:nsamp, lwd=plotPars$lwd)
axis(side=1)

```
